label: 粟田真人
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: d. 719, aged sixty-one.  He was Governor-General (Sotsu) of the Government Headquarters in Kyushu (Dazaifu), had served as an Envoy to the T'ang (Ken-Tō-shi), had assisted in drawing up the law codes, had acted as an adviser at the court, and was a scholar of renown (A: p. 176). [帥、九州、太宰府、遣唐使] [also Awata no Mahito]
